name: Gribber Grabber Grapple Grotto
description:
A simple game that we made for the LudemDare49 game jam, made in roughly 2 days by a team of 3
The theme was 'Unstable'

You have descended through the cave towards the old ruins.  As you make your way further and further down, you notice a rock slide behind you.

It seems to have stopped, but you now have no options but to proceed forward.
It sure was nice of whoever left these torches to mark suitable stalactites for a grappling hook.

Note - The WebGL build has a mouse sensitivity issue
--------------------

Play with the usual WASD + mouse controls
left click fires a grapple that can latch on to stalactites with torches on them
right click reels you in towards the hook
